column2: under Severe driving replace ever 3,750 miles.  Turbos must have the synthetic oil service done at least every 3,750 miles or 3 3/4 months

Subaru Super Coolant. 1st replacement interval is 11years/137,500 miles (220,000 km). 2nd replacement interval is 6 years/ 75,000 miles (120,000 km) after the 1st. If towing replace more often. Use Subaru coolant only, do not mix with other types or it will reduce protection

column1: Brake - pads, linings, front/rear axle boots, CV joints, axle half shaft, parking brake

column2: replace the paper filter (behind glovebox)  every 1-2 years depending on air conditions
